name: Averis
description: Founded in 2006 with an MSC Malaysia status, Averis Sdn Bhd is one of the pioneers in Malaysia to offer Global Business Services (GBS). We provide best-in-class services in Finance and Accounting, Human Resources, Information Technology, Shipping Documentation, Data Security and Business Information Protection. We are guided by our T.O.P.I.C.C Core Values: Complementary Team, Ownership, People, Integrity, Customer and Continuous Improvement. We provide our customers with highly-scalable and cost-effective business services, from back-office operations to business support solutions. Averis is one of the leading Global Business Services providers in Malaysia. We have over 15 years of experience serving customers in the resource-based manufacturing industry. Today, we serve over 300 companies across a diverse range of industries with a special focus on commodities including palm oil, pulp and paper, oil and gas, viscose fibre and specialty cellulose. Our daily operations serve a combined workforce of over 60,000 people across 32 different locations globally.
features: Averis’s Finance and Accounting (FA) Team is trusted by customers to help their businesses maximise productivity and reduce expenditure.

Like all other services offered by Averis, our HR Team leverages RPA to help customers drive economies of scale through reduced manual workload, centralised and better-controlled processes which improves visibility and reduces costs at the same time.

Information Technology (IT) is a fundamental enabler for our customers’ businesses. We help businesses to run by providing IT infrastructure and solutions such as conventional workspace, virtual workspace solutions, local and cloud storage, data centre management and cyber security among the list.
